text: Phùng Quang Thanh (2 February 1949 – 11 September 2021) was Vietnamese politician and general. Phùng Quang Thanh was an officer of the Vietnam People's Army and a member of the Politburo of the Communist Party of Vietnam. Thahn died on 11 September 2021 in Hanoi, Vietnam from lung cancer at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Hanoi Category:Vietnamese generals Category:Vietnamese communist politicians
title: Phùng Quang Thanh
